import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function AddAlbum() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ artist: '', title: '', genre: '', recordLabel: '', releaseDate: '', description: '', rating: '', coverImage: '' }); const handleChange = event => { setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // Do something with the form data, such as sending it to an API console.log(formData); }; return ( <>
